records.summary_analyst: CVE-2025-54236 affects Adobe Commerce by allowing remote attackers to exploit a server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability, which could lead to unauthorized access to internal services or systems.

records.summary_analyst: CVE-2025-59287 is a vulnerability in Microsoft Windows Server 2012 that allows an attacker to exploit a flaw in the RPC (Remote Procedure Call) service, enabling remote code execution through specially crafted requests sent to the server.

records.description: CVE-2025-59287 is a vulnerability in Microsoft Windows Server 2012 that allows an attacker to exploit a flaw in the RPC (Remote Procedure Call) service, enabling remote code execution through specially crafted requests sent to the server.
